reviewText: The first doc is better. I would say to watch this simply for the studio footage as it gives some good insights. This footage is in the special features section.

I'm a huge fan of SOTY. This dvd has some pretty cool footage and some really good insight on the recording process, but theres no real order or flow of the footage. I also felt like there could have been more live performance footage as wee
there were alot of bad reviews of this dvd. im sorry i have absolutely no complaints whatsoever about this dvd. it is one of my faviorites in my entire collection if not THE favortie.
This DVD is a little insane because it doesn't follow the standard DVD chronology but it's still really cool!  Story of the Year is amazing and this DVD exemplifies that x10!
last dvd was more organized this was just random footage. good random footage and funny but not as good as the first.plus would of preferred separating live show from backstage.
